id: Trump says US is ending decades-old nuclear arms treaty with Russia
paragraph: By Sophie Tatum, Ryan Browne and Kevin Bohn, CNNUpdated 4:59 PM ET, Sun October 21, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.Washington  (CNN)President Donald Trump announced Saturday that the US is pulling out of the landmark Intermediate-Range Nuclear Forces Treaty with Russia, a decades-old agreement that has drawn the ire of the President. CNN's Devan Cole and Alla Eschenko contributed to this report.
